rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: With this year's boost and demand from importers, Brazil is expected to hold a nearly 38% market share of the global chicken trade, up from around 36% in 2022, ABPA said.
